  • Method Details

    • message

      void message(Info_itf_Impl infos, String s) throws RemoteException
      Remotely called, for user to broadcast a message. infos are necessary to verify that the stored hash by the server is the same as the one given by the client.
      Parameters:
      infos - infos containing the username and identifier of the sender
      s - the message to send
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • connect

      String connect(String user, String pass, ClientMessagesInterface cmi) throws RemoteException
      Remotely called function to try a user:pass. Returns a unique identifier if it works, else returns null. Important security note : this is not secured. The communication between the server and the client can be caught by a MITM attack, and the passwords are sent in clear. A document here shows ideas on how to implement it, but as it was not the focus, we did not try too much : https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/technotes/guides/rmi/socketfactory/index.html
      Parameters:
      user - username of the user
      pass - password of the user (in clear !)
      cmi - ClientMessage stub to enable server->Client communication
      Returns:
      String containing the unique identifier of this client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • disconnect

      void disconnect(Info_itf_Impl infos) throws RemoteException
      disconnect user from the server
      Parameters:
      infos - infos containing the username and identifier of the sender
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • startGUI

      void startGUI(String identifier) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Start the GUI of the server
      Parameters:
      identifier - server identifier
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI COnnection issues
      NotBoundException - RMI Connection issues

    • loadUsers

      void loadUsers(String s) throws RemoteException
      Load userData from the file, to an arraylist
      Parameters:
      s - Filename to load from
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • loadHistory

      void loadHistory(String s) throws RemoteException
      Load chat history from the file, to an arraylist
      Parameters:
      s - Filename to load from
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI COnnection issues

    • notifyOfActiveGUI

      void notifyOfActiveGUI(Info_itf_Impl inf) throws RemoteException
      Remotely called, by client, to notify the server that it has launched the gui
      Parameters:
      inf - username and identifier of a user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • startLogs

      void startLogs(String identifier) throws RemoteException
      Start logs backup every 30 seconds
      Parameters:
      identifier - HelloServer identifier to avoid server spoofing
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues
